title: User-Centric Privacy Controls – User-Friendly Privacy Settings Interface
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a simple and empowering way to manage my privacy settings so that I can feel secure while using ALFRED without feeling monitored.

title: Adaptive System Configuration – Guided Onboarding with Voice Assistance
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a guided onboarding process with voice assistance so that I can easily configure ALFRED to meet my needs without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to seamlessly integrate with my wearable health monitor so that I can track my health metrics and receive timely reminders without feeling overly monitored.

title: Cognitive Support through Voice Commands
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to use voice commands to access cognitive stimulation games and set appointment reminders so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and manage my daily tasks without feeling monitored.

title: Simple Voice Feedback Collection Prompts
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to provide simple voice feedback to ALFRED about my experiences so that I can ensure the system is helping me maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Accessibility Compliance Assurance through Diverse User Testing for Older Adults
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to be thoroughly tested for accessibility so that I can easily navigate and interact with the system without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.
